mapper.update: update customer set cu_name = #{cuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cu_sex = #{cuSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cu_password = #{cuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cu_phone = #{cuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cu_birth = #{cuBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cu_address = #{cuAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cu_remarks = #{cuRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cu_id = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cu_id, cu_name, cu_sex, u_id, cu_password, cu_phone, cu_birth, cu_address, cu_remarks from customer where cu_id = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cu_id, cu_name, cu_sex, u_id, cu_password, cu_phone, cu_birth, cu_address, cu_remarks from customer
